events: Lost their sibling Scilla when Stemaers was 3 and Scilla was 5.
Lost their sibling Meinoldo when Stemaers was 8 and Meinoldo was 1.
Lost wife Mette when she gave birth to Ghodelde.
Lost father at the age of 13
Lost their sibling Hadewigis when Stemaers was 15 and Hadewigis was 2.
Lost their sibling Gheesen when Stemaers was 21 and Gheesen was 17.
Lost mother at the age of 21
